title: Roehl Family Chiropractic - Chiropractor in Staunton, VA US
description: Roehl Family Chiropractic is your local Chiropractor in Staunton serving all of your needs. Call us today at 540-886-0200 for an appointment.
cleaned_text: Einstein reputedly divided people in two groups, those who believe we live in a friendly universe, and those who don't.
